data.paragraph: I used headings with different sized text for clear visual hierarchy.
I used landmarks to help users navigate the site, including users who rely on assistive technologies.
I designed the site with alt text available on each page for smooth screen reader access.

data1.paragraph: Contrasting colors were used to visually facilitate the information.
Used icons to help make navigation easier.
Used detailed imagery for every meal to help all users better recognise the dishes.
